attributes.action: make discrimination of potential employees because of poor Credit History illegal in any working environment.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I attended a job interview over a year ago and was unsuccessful.  When I asked for feedback on the interview, I was informed that I had failed due to my credit history.
This seems a ludicrous reason not to employ someone, who is capable and more than willing to do an honest day's work in order to better themselves and to clear any outstanding debts.  This is a very unfair way of vetting someone at interview level, especially if the potential employee is in debt due to circumstances beyond their control.
This kind of vetting should be abolished and made illegal.
